Container.Name: Unreal-Tournament-99
Container.Overview:
This Docker will download and install Unreal Tournament 99 with the patch v.451
**ATTENTION:** It is strongly recommended to change the maps and game modes from the web server!
Container.DonateText: If you like my work please

Config.Name: UDP - Game & Query Port
Config.Description: UDP Game & Query Port (If you want to change the game/query port please change it in the UnrealTournament.ini file first, then delete this entry and create a new Port range in the template with the Host and Container port set to the same as in the UnrealTournament.ini)

Config.Name: Inital Map
Config.Description: Map which is loaded at server start (you can find a list of maps in the /Maps folder - it is recommended to change the map from the web server).

Config.Name: Game Type
Config.Description: Intial game type (valid options are: 'Botpack.DeathMatchPlus', 'BotPack.TeamGamePlus', 'BotPack.Assault', 'BotPack.Domination', 'BotPack.CTFGame' & 'BotPack.LastManStanding' - it is recommended to change the game type from the web server!)

Config.Name: Enable Web Server
Config.Description: Set this value to 'true' to enable or to 'false' to disable the web server.

Config.Name: WebServer Username
Config.Description: Specify your prefered login name for the web server.

Config.Name: WebServer Password
Config.Description: Specify your prefered password for the web server (initial password 'Docker' without quotes).

Config.Name: Startup Parameters
Config.Description: Enter your start up parameters for the server if needed.

Config.Name: Extra Startup Parameters
Config.Description: Enter your extra start up parameters seperated with ? and start with a ? (don't put spaces in between eg: ?MaxPlayers=20)

Config.Name: User.ini
Config.Description: Only change if you know what you are doing!

Config.Name: Server.ini
Config.Description: Only change if you know what you are doing!

Config.Name: Server DL URL
Config.Description: Only change if you know what you are doing!

Config.Name: Server Patch DL URL
Config.Description: Only change if you know what you are doing!
